sentences.en: "Aventure" is often glossed as simply good or bad "fortune" or "chance."
sentences.cn: "Aventure"常常被注解为简单的好或坏的“运气”或“机会”。

sentences.en: A person , who is imperious and tries to gloss over his fault, is bound to suffer in the end.

sentences.en: Correct your mistake the moment you realize it and don't try to gloss over your mistake.
sentences.cn: 要知过必改,不要文过饰非.
